title: Bug 112279[Acceptance]Relative path doesn't work in image builder.
description: Bug 112279[Acceptance]Relative path doesn't work in image builder. Description:Relative path doesn't work in image builder.Steps to reproduce:1.
EB: Save and preview.Expected result:Image displays when preview.Actual result:No images display.
SR: New a report2. copy one image file(.jpg,etc) to the same path as the report.3. Insert an image, input ".jpg" below "Enter URI".4.
